subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Eli Manning is staying characteristically calm, brushing off praise as he did all doubters and accepting his new standing as the sleepy-eyed face of the Giants with a familiar aw-shucks shrug.
snippet: Eli Manning is staying characteristically calm, brushing off praise as he did all doubters and accepting his new standing as the sleepy-eyed face of the Giants with a familiar aw-shucks shrug.
